entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
